name: Junk Food Monster
description:
Game made for ScoreSpace Game Jam #21, the theme was Bounce!

The GamJam was also being sponsored by Loot Locker!

This is my third gameJam entry, still learning so much and loving all the challenges! The game is incomplete but plan on spending time to fix it!!

Description:

You're one of the last hungry monsters from space! After waking up from the long sleep you are so hungry and the only thing that can fulfill your hunger... are hamburgers!!!! Eat as many as you can while avoiding the angry food carts!

Controls:

A & D to move Left and Right avoiding the pesky Food Carts!
